verse.roman:
tarhy eva pratibudhyendro
guru-helanam ātmanaḥ
garhayām āsa sadasi
svayam ātmānam ātmanā

synonyms: tarhi—then, immediately; eva—indeed; pratibudhya—realizing; indraḥ—King Indra; guru-helanam—disrespect to the spiritual master; ātmanaḥ—his own; garhayām āsa—reproached; sadasi—in that assembly; svayam—personally; ātmānam—himself; ātmanā—by himself.
translation: Indra, the King of heaven, could immediately understand his mistake. Realizing he had disrespected his spiritual master, he condemned himself in the presence of all the members of the assembly.
